author: cnbc.com
title: Jamba reports 4Q loss
text:
EMERYVILLE, Calif. (AP) _ Jamba Inc. (JMBA) on Monday reported a loss of $15.2 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the Emeryville, California-based company said it had a loss of 99 cents.
The juice and smoothie franchise posted revenue of $17.3 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported a loss of $22.4 million, or $1.47 per share, swinging to a loss in the period. Revenue was reported as $79.6 million.
Jamba shares have increased roughly 3 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has dropped 14 percent in the last 12 months.
